comment: The group sum depends only on the base set, additive operation, and topology components. Note that for entirely unrestricted functions, there can be dependency on out-of-domain values of the operation, so this is somewhat weaker than ~ mndpropd etc. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)
